author: adapdoaosdaoda
description: Event scheduling polling system with dropdown menus, visual calendar images with emoji rendering, and conflict detection. Allows users to vote for preferred times for various events (Hero's Realm, Sword Trial, Party, Breaking Army, Showdown) while preventing conflicting time selections. Generates beautiful calendar visualizations with emojis.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing EventPolling! Use `[p]eventpoll create` to create your first event poll.

REQUIRED DEPENDENCIES:
• pip install Pillow
• pip install git+https://github.com/jay3332/pilmoji

Note: pilmoji enables emoji rendering in calendar images. If not installed, calendars will use text labels (HR, ST, P, etc.) as fallback.
short: Event scheduling polls with visual calendars
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user selections for event scheduling polls. Users can clear their data by having an admin use the `[p]eventpoll clear` command.
